definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for

pinyin: Ao4 si1 wei1 xin1 ji2 zhong1 ying2

sentences.english: I worked with Viktor Frankl, a Nazi prison camp survivor, for many years.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，我曾帮助过一位纳粹集中营幸存者。

sentences.english: One was the discovery by Allied troops of the German death camps.
sentences.chinese: 一个是发现由德国死亡集中营盟军部队。

sentences.english: He may retain his human dignity even in a concentration camp.
sentences.chinese: 即使是置身于集中营，他仍可以保有他的人性尊严。
达濠，纳粹第一个集中营，完工。

sentences.english: Three white dress uniform pseudo into a concentration camp, he took out the arraignment.
sentences.chinese: 白三穿着伪军装进了集中营，他拿出提审令。

sentences.english: Mr. Solzhenitsyn was not the first to write about the camps.
sentences.chinese: 索尔仁尼琴并非第一位写集中营题材的作家。

sentences.english: Nine chances out of ten we'd both wind up in a concentration camp.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩十有八九会被抓进集中营。

sentences.english: My orders are that one man in every ten shall be shot in this camp.
sentences.chinese: 我的命令是集中营里每十个人要有一个被枪决。

sentences.english: Pay respects to Concentration Camp piously.
The ladies who ruled the roost at Almack's were the de-fact queens of London society.
sentences.chinese: 掌管集中营卧室的女士们确实就是伦敦社会的女皇。

sentences.english: It's all that remains of the hospital at Heart Mountain Internment Camp.
sentences.chinese: 它的所有医院心山集中营的遗迹。

sentences.english: They liberated all war prisoners from the concentration camp.
sentences.chinese: 他们将所有战俘从集中营里解放出来。

sentences.english: He said he had been cruelly hounded in the concenration camp.
sentences.chinese: 他说他在集中营曾受到残酷的迫害。

sentences.english: I recognized a former member of the concentration camps seminar.
sentences.chinese: 我认出了以前在集中营研讨会上的一个人。

sentences.english: Demjanjuk is alleged to have taken part in the mass murder of Jews at the Sobibor concentration camp.
sentences.chinese: 他还被指控参与了索比堡集中营的犹太人大屠杀。

sentences.english: They smuggled in some food for the comrades in the concentration camp .
sentences.chinese: 他们给集中营里的同志们偷偷送进去一些食物。

definition: labor camp/prison camp with hard labor

pinyin: Ao4 si1 wei1 xin1 ji2 zhong1 ying2
